Class Sport

  • java.lang.Object
    • Sport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SportsMethods
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Baseball, Basketball, Football, Hockey
    public abstract class Sport
extends java.lang.Object
implements SportsMethods
    Superclass for our sports subclass
